column4: hello all.  I'm having some trouble seting a route.  I keep getting an error stating that the "Network is unreachable".  Any takers?
sys (172.16.100.100) --> default gw (172.16.100.1)  rying to set a route for 10.0.1.0 net to route through 172.16.100.2
route add default gw <gw IP address>
I already have a default gw
